src:
Saudi Aramcos börsansökan godkänd
Saudiarabiens kapitalmarknadsmyndighet CMA har godkänt oljegiganten Saudi Aramcos begäran om börsnotering, rapporterar Reuters. Om planerna går i lås kan det bli en av historiens hittills största börsintroduktioner.
03 Nov 2019, 07:09 by TT

text:
Saudi Aramco's stock exchange application approved
Saudi Arabia's capital market authority CMA has approved oil giant Saudi Aramco's request for IPO, reports Reuters. If the plans lock in, it could become one of history's largest IPOs to date.
03 Nov 2019, 07:09 by TT
